column2: Ruth's Hospitality Group, Inc. engages in the development and operation of fine dining restaurants. The company is headquartered in Winter Park, Florida and currently employs 5,408 full-time employees. The firm operates through two segments. As of December 25, 2016, the Company-owned steakhouse restaurant segment included 68 Ruth's Chris Steak House restaurants and one Ruth's Chris Steak House restaurant, and the franchise operations segment included 81 franchisee-owned Ruth's Chris Steak House restaurants. Its restaurant's menu features a selection of Prime and Choice grade steaks, and other offerings. Its menu also includes lamb chops, fish, shrimp, crab, chicken and lobster. Its Ruth's Chris restaurants offer 10 to 13 appetizer items, including Orleans-style barbequed shrimp, mushrooms stuffed with crabmeat, lobster bisque and osso bucco ravioli. The company also offers a range of potatoes and vegetables as side dishes. For dessert, creme brulee, white chocolate bread pudding, cheesecake, fresh seasonal berries with sweet cream sauce and other selections are available.
